node.title: 4. Making Things Right
node.description:
In the last session, we learned there is much to confess! What does it mean to confess? Why is it necessary? To whom should we confess? What does it mean to make things right? Is God a spoilsport, wanting to ruin our fun? Get Bible and SOP answers on this important subject.

 

For PDF series guide, click here: 

http://www.path2prayer.com/article/1192/revival-and-holy-spirit/books-sermons/new-resources/discipleheart#RevivalNowBentonHarbor
